name: Savage Worlds Adventure Edition Character Sheet Template

meta.helperText:
Savage Worlds Adventure Edition (SWADE) © 2020 Pinnacle Entertainment Group.

*This Fari character sheet was independently designed by Discord user PistolPants#8314 and is not affiliated with the original game designers and publishers.
Standard Pace = 6 spaces x 2 yards = 12 yards

= 2 + 1/2 die type value for Fighting skill (total of 2 if no Fighting Skill) + weapon/shield bonuses
» This is also the TN required to hit your character in hand-to-hand

2 + 1/2 Vigor die value + armor (torso)
» Damage threshold (equal or more)

blocks.label: Info Text
blocks.value: FOR PARRY/TOUGHNESS WHEN USING d12+mod TRAITS: add half the fixed modifier, rounded down. E.g. d12+1 » use 6 + 0, d12+2 » use 6 + 1

blocks.label: Info Text
blocks.value:
» FOR PASSIVE/INNATE ROLLS
Every attribute begins as d4. ON START OF CHARACTER: Can spend 5 pts. to level up dice for a stat (1 pt. per die size). Cannot level up over d12 in most cases (unless abilities allow for +1 mod per point).

blocks.label: Info Text
blocks.value:
» FOR ACTIVE ROLLS
Every CORE SKILL (Athletics, Common Knowledge, Notice, Persuasion, Stealth) attribute begins as d4. ON START OF CHARACTER: Can spend 12 pts. to buy skills and level up dice for a stat (1 pt. per die size). Cannot level up over d12 in most cases (unless abilities allow for +1 mod per point). UNSKILLED ATTEMPTS: If an action requires a roll but the player doesn't have the skill required, roll d4 (and Wild Die if with Wild Card) with -2 mod.
